item.title: Pimco 的 Ivascyn 认为未来道路 "坎坷不平"，有助于债券发展
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：A dicey combination of renewed market turbulence, softer economic data and crowded trades — all against a hotter political backdrop — makes bonds the best bet as a defensive play heading into the rest of the year, said Daniel Ivascyn, chief investment officer at Pacific Investment Management Co.】

item.title: 甲骨文和谷歌的老员工加入英伟达支持的 CoreWeave，领导人工智能工作
item.description: 在这家由英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）支持的云计算公司从投资者手中募集到数十亿美元资金后，CoreWeave Inc.聘请了两位来自谷歌和甲骨文公司的高级管理人员来构建其人工智能基础设施。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. hired two senior executives from Google and Oracle Corp. to build out its artificial intelligence infrastructure after the Nvidia Corp.-backed cloud computing company raised billions of dollars from investors.】

item.title: 私募股权投资在寻求交易中积累了 7,220 亿美元的财富
item.description: 最大的公开交易另类资产管理公司拥有超过 5 万亿美元的资金，它们正在为交易卷土重来做准备。【原文：The biggest publicly traded alternative asset managers have more than a half-trillion dollars to put to work — and they’re gearing up for a deals comeback.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利为 ECM 和杠杆融资部门任命新的全球主管
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利在对其投资银行进行改组后，提拔了一批最资深的资本市场银行家。【原文：Morgan Stanley has promoted a slew of its most senior capital markets bankers after a reshuffle atop its investment bank, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 安哥拉考虑在收益率进一步下降后尽快出售欧洲债券
item.description: 安哥拉周四称，在今年少数几个非洲国家筹集海外债务之后，该国正考虑在有利的市场条件下出售欧洲债券。【原文：Angola said on Thursday it’s considering selling Eurobonds under favorable market conditions after a handful of African countries raised overseas debt this year.】

item.title: 前贝莱德经理在小额债券对冲基金获得 20% 的回报率
item.description: 詹姆斯-普拉斯科夫斯基（James Pruskowski）在贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.他将这一专长带到了华尔街另一个神秘的领域--对冲基金行业，并取得了战胜市场的业绩。【原文：James Pruskowski learned the intricacies of the municipal bond market in his 30 years at BlackRock Inc., before exiting the world’s largest asset manager in 2023. He brought that expertise to another arcane part of Wall Street, the hedge fund industry, and produced market-beating results.】

item.title: 北方信托称动摇的垃圾债券投资者已意识到再融资风险
item.description: 据北方信托资产管理公司（Northern Trust Asset Management）称，随着高杠杆公司在仍然高利率的环境下排队为其债务再融资，企业债务市场中风险最高的角落的债券持有人将面临更多的痛苦。【原文：Bondholders in the riskiest corners of the corporate debt market face more pain as highly levered companies line up to refinance their debt in a still high interest-rate environment, according to Northern Trust Asset Management.】

item.title: 私人信贷公司在澳大利亚富人中找到 1 万亿美元的目标
item.description: 在花费数年时间争取澳大利亚最大养老基金的委托之后，全球私人信贷经理们正将资源投入到澳大利亚的新一批投资者身上：富有的个人。【原文：After spending years courting Australia’s biggest pension funds for mandates, global private credit managers are pouring resources into a new crop of investors in the country: wealthy individuals.】

item.title: 关于 ZiG，津巴布韦为稳定货币所做的最新努力
item.description: 在设计可信的国家货币的最新努力中，津巴布韦于 4 月份用 ZiG（津巴布韦黄金的简称）取代了美元。新货币单位由中央银行持有的金银和外汇储备支持。这是津巴布韦自 2008 年以来第六次尝试建立自己的货币，根据国际货币基金组织的估计，2008 年的通货膨胀率超过了 5000 亿个百分点。这不仅使货币变得毫无价值，还使该货币单位成为全球的笑柄：美国财政部长【原文：In the latest effort to devise a credible national currency, Zimbabwe in April replaced its dollar with the ZiG, short for Zimbabwe Gold. The new unit is backed by bullion and foreign currency reserves held at the central bank. It’s the country’s sixth attempt at establishing its own currency since 2008, when inflation crossed 500 billion percent, according to International Monetary Fund estimates. Not only did that render it worthless, it turned the unit into a global punchline: US Treasury sec】

item.title: 破产的 WOM 公司债券反弹使亿万富翁卡洛斯-斯利姆成为焦点
item.description: 破产四个月后，WOM 投资者可能会得到喘息的机会。【原文：Four months into bankruptcy, WOM investors may be catching a break.】

item.title: 阿根廷大豆压榨工人将薪酬问题罢工延长至第三天
item.description: 由于与贸易公司的工资谈判陷入僵局，阿根廷油籽加工厂的工人连续第三天举行罢工，导致这个世界上最大的豆粕和豆油出口国的经济活动陷入瘫痪。【原文：Workers at oilseed-processing plants in Argentina are extending their strike for a third consecutive day as wage talks with trading houses hit an impasse, crippling activity in the world’s biggest exporter of soy meal and soy oil.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚出人意料地要求削减债务，债券持有人对此表示反对
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚提出在国家债务重组过程中削减 20% 的债务，令其债券持有人措手不及，为紧张的谈判埋下了伏笔。【原文：Ethiopia caught its bondholders off-guard with a proposal to introduce a 20% haircut in the nation’s debt restructuring process, setting the scene for tense negotiations.】

item.title: 莱姆苏格尔的对冲基金增长 7%，资产达到 52 亿美元
item.description: Hamza Lemssouguer 的对冲基金摆脱了今年上半年的平庸表现，7 月份的收益约为 7%，这位前瑞士信贷交易员告诉投资者，在许多欧洲企业的债务墙迫在眉睫之前，他将利用资金缺口。【原文：Hamza Lemssouguer’s hedge fund shrugged off a mediocre first half of the year with gains of about 7% in July and the former Credit Suisse trader told investors he is positioned to exploit funding gaps ahead of a looming debt wall for many European corporates.】

item.title: 美国农民合作社 CHS 将与 Rumo 合作建设巴西谷物码头
item.description: 美国最大的农民合作社 CHS Inc. 将与巴西火车运营商 Rumo SA 合作，在南美最大的港口建设一个大型谷物码头。【原文：CHS Inc., the largest U.S. farmer cooperative, will partner with Brazilian train operator Rumo SA to build a major grain terminal in the South American nation’s largest port.】

item.title: Vanguard 新兴市场股票 ETF 遭遇科维德恐慌以来最严重资金外流
item.description: 美国交易所交易基金的投资者正在将资金撤出新兴市场股票，这使得先锋集团（Vanguard Group）旗下规模达 750 亿美元的该资产类别基金出现了自 2020 年大流行性抛售以来最长的连续资金外流。【原文：Investors in US exchange-traded funds are pulling money out of emerging-market stocks, sending Vanguard Group’s $75 billion fund for the asset class into its longest streak of outflows since the pandemic selloff of 2020.】

item.title: 芬兰财政部计划中的预算工作面临阻力
item.description: 芬兰财政部预计，明年的预算赤字将从四年来的最高水平略微收窄，同时仍承诺在增税和削减开支的帮助下，到2027年实现公共财政平衡。【原文：Finland’s Finance Ministry sees next year’s budget deficit narrowing only marginally from a projected four-year high while still pledging to balance the public finances by 2027 with the help of tax hikes and spending cuts.】

item.title: 拉丁美洲鱼子酱之王的销售额多年来首次反弹
item.description: 随着鱼子酱行业从投资不足和大流行病的干扰中恢复过来，拉丁美洲最大的鱼子酱公司多年来首次增加了鱼子酱的出口量。【原文：Latin America’s largest caviar companies are set to increase exports of the delicacy for the first time in years as the industry recovers from underinvestment and pandemic disruptions.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行加入竞争对手行列，取消英国银行家奖金上限
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）将取消对部分高级银行家和交易员奖金的限制，此举可能会为这些员工赚取更高的薪酬铺平道路。【原文：Barclays Plc is removing a limit on some of its top bankers’ and traders’ bonuses, a move that could pave the way for those staffers to earn bigger paychecks.】

item.title: 阿联酋在新一轮打击影子船队行动中禁止悬挂斯威士兰国旗的船只航行
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国禁止悬挂非洲内陆国埃斯瓦提尼国旗的船只入境，这是中东国家与帮助运输俄罗斯石油供应的危险船只保持距离的最新迹象。【原文：The United Arab Emirates banned arriving ships that carry the flag of landlocked African nation Eswatini, the latest sign of the Middle East nation distancing itself from risky vessels that help haul Russian oil supplies.】

item.title: 华尔街工程师发明了一种新的 "头脑风暴 "期权交易
item.description: 金融奇才们在追求衍生品繁荣的过程中，可能已经创造出了最令人眼花缭乱的产品：Cboe 全球市场公司（Cboe Global Markets Inc.【原文：Financial wizards have conjured up possibly their most dizzying product yet in the quest to ride the derivatives boom: Cboe Global Markets Inc. is poised to offer options on futures for an index based on options on another index.】

item.title: 印度家庭认为未来几个月通胀将加速
item.description: 印度中央银行的一项调查显示，印度家庭预计未来三个月至一年内通胀将加速，主要受食品价格、住房和服务成本的影响。【原文：Indian households expect inflation to accelerate through the next three months to one year driven mainly by food prices, housing and cost of services, according to a survey by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 沃尔格林启动价值 6 亿美元的首笔垃圾债券销售
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. has started marketing its first high-yield bond sale, raising funds to address a note that’s due in November.】

item.title: 墨西哥利率决议前通胀超预期
item.description: 墨西哥 7 月份的总体通胀率略高于预期，这增加了墨西哥央行在周四晚些时候举行的连续第三次会议上维持关键利率不变的可能性。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation accelerated slightly more than expected in July, boosting the chances that the central bank keeps its key rate unchanged for a third straight meeting later Thursday.】

item.title: 森林法带来的供应风险凸显，咖啡价差飙升
item.description: 由于贸易商担心一项保护森林的新法律会抑制进口，欧洲咖啡供应即将受到挤压的威胁正在加剧波动。【原文：The threat of a coming squeeze in Europe’s coffee supplies is stoking volatility as traders worry that a new law to protect forests will curb imports.】

item.title: 比特币矿工储备减半后跌至三年新低
item.description: 在 4 月份软件代码调整导致收入减少后，通过验证区块链上的交易来赚取利润的公司所储备的比特币数量已降至三年来的最低点。【原文：The amount of Bitcoin held in reserve by the companies who earn a profit by validating transactions on the blockchain has dropped to a three-year low in the wake of the April software code adjustment that slashed revenue.】

item.title: 茅台计划在股价下跌时发放大量现金股利
item.description: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd.）计划在 2024 年至 2026 年期间每年派发不低于年利润 75% 的现金股利，因为这家中国高端白酒生产商今年正努力应对股价下跌。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. plans annual cash dividends of no less than 75% of yearly profit for 2024 to 2026 as the Chinese premium liquor maker grapples with falling stock prices this year.】

item.title: 抵押贷款锁定令美国经济一年损失 200 亿美元
item.description: 由于数以百万计的房主选择继续居住在现有的房屋中，而不是申请新的、更昂贵的抵押贷款，美国经济的成本正在不断增加。【原文：As millions of homeowners choose to stay put in their current homes rather than take out new, more expensive mortgages, the costs to the US economy are piling up.】

item.title: 宏观问题和利率上调抑制了私营公司的增长
item.description: 据周四发布的林肯私营市场指数报告显示，由于要应对宏观经济问题和严峻的融资条件，第二季度私营企业的增长速度有所放缓。【原文：The growth of private companies slowed in the second quarter as they grappled with macroeconomic issues and tough financing conditions, according to a Lincoln Private Market Index report on Thursday.】

item.title: 随着消费增长，顶级咖啡贸易商在中国开设办事处
item.description: 全球最大的咖啡贸易商诺伊曼咖啡集团（Neumann Kaffee Gruppe）计划在中国开设第一家办事处，因为大品牌连锁店正在中国崭露头角并展开竞争。【原文：The world’s largest coffee trader Neumann Kaffee Gruppe plans to open its first office in China as big-brand chains expand and compete in the budding market.】

item.title: 8000 亿美元海湾财富基金在法院败诉后可能面临英国诉讼
item.description: 伦敦一家法院裁定，可以在英国起诉管理着 8000 多亿美元主权财富基金的科威特投资局，这为员工向该机构提起法律诉讼打开了大门，而该机构此前曾声称享有外交豁免权。【原文：A London court ruled that the Kuwait Investment Authority, which manages a sovereign wealth fund in excess of $800 billion, can be sued in the UK, opening the door for employees to launch legal action against the unit that has previously asserted diplomatic immunity.】
